Reviews.Title: Very happy with this phone
Reviews.Author: Philip M. Blacet
Reviews.Content: This is the second Stratosphere II phone I have purchased - one as a gift.  I love this phone and the free apps that make it special.

Reviews.Title: Great phone but kinda small keyboard
Reviews.Author: Philip V. Nicola III
Reviews.Content: Great phone.. Keyboard buttons a little small but good format setup.. Not great for gaming and less than a gig of ram but plays most games fine and the camera IMO is really good for a phone

Reviews.Title: Stratosphere Review
Reviews.Author: jdg
Reviews.Content: Great phone especially for the money.  Worth buying last years model with all of the features of a phone today.  4G, Google Now, etc.
